title: "Mermaid's Fantasy"
content:
Welcome to Mermaid's Fantasy, a website dedicated to all things whimsical and fantastical! Our site is a hub for lovers of mermaids, fairies, unicorns, dragons, and all other magical creatures. 

Explore our collection of stories, artwork, and poetry that will transport you to enchanted realms. Our community of writers and artists come from all over the world, sharing their unique perspectives and creativity with us.

Join our forum to connect with like-minded individuals who share your passion for fantasy and fiction. Share your own work or simply chat with others about your favorite books, movies, and TV shows.

Don't forget to check out our shop, where you can find a variety of merchandise featuring our original designs. From t-shirts to phone cases, our products are perfect for anyone who wants to add a touch of magic to their everyday life.

Thank you for visiting Mermaid's Fantasy, we hope you enjoy your stay in our mystical world! üßú‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüßö‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èü¶Ñüêâ‚ú®

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A whimsical image of a mermaid sitting on a rock for a fantasy or fiction website"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
